column6: Journey back to the darkest days of World War II, and witness the horrible events that took place on the worst day of the Invaders' career...when the legendary heroes committed a deed so terrible its repercussions threaten us all in the present!  Plus: Learn the never-before-told circumstances behind Arnim Zola gaining his freakish artificial body!  All this, and the return of the Invaders' worst enemies!   Rated T  '$3.99
column8: | writer:Christos Gage | penciller:CAIO REISS | penciler:Alex Ross
